---
category: news
title: "Artificial intelligence helps radiologists to process more than two million studies"
excerpt: "More than two million studies since the services operation start were analyzed by Moscow radiologists using computer vision algorithms based on artificial intelligence. New technologies have become part of the Moscow unified digital platform and have helped to reduce the time for describing images by an average of 30 percent."
